game.name: Vegas Infinite by PokerStars
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Supported, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, a world of entertainment with no limits. Leap into VR or PC with no headset required! Take on the house at blackjack and roulette. Light up the dice at craps. Play dazzling slots and challenge real players at authentic poker. Your seat is open.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, a world of entertainment with no limits. Leap into VR or PC with no headset required! Take on the house at blackjack and roulette. Light up the dice at craps. Play dazzling slots and challenge real players at authentic poker. Your seat is open.

reviewHighlights.text: After YEARS of playing this game (before it rebranded to "pokerstars infinite" and it reset my playtime), now suddenly the game is not available in my...
You know its a great game when every other roll in craps is a 7 and when the dealer in blackjack gets 21 more times you'll ever get in your lifetime.
